attributes.action: reduce the classified period for census data from 100 years to 20 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is about time that census data was released after 20 years, thus allowing genealogists to research their family trees, this will mean that a person can research his/  her tree in his/her own lifetime

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
